title: Episode 215. “He wants a house, I don’t want to go bankrupt.”
description: ﻿ Athena (31) and Arie (30) are newly married and dreaming of buying a home, starting a family, and traveling the world. But their finances—and philosophies—don’t align. Athena’s upbringing was defined by instability and strict religious messaging around money; Arie’s was middle-class and frugal. Now, they’re realizing that love alone isn’t enough—they need a shared […] The post Episode 215. “He wants a house, I don’t want to go bankrupt.” first appeared on I Will Teach You To Be Rich. Source
author: Ramit Sethi
